text: Manfred "Manni" Kaiser (7 January 1929 - 15 February 2017) was a German footballer. He played as a a midfielder. He played for Wismut Gera, Wismut Aue and the East Germany national team. He was born in Zeitz. Kaiser died on 15 February 2017 in Lindau, at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:East German sportspeople Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from Saxony-Anhalt
title: Manfred Kaiser
